name: Cocoa
description:
Made using love 11.3, Cocoa is a game where you match ingredients to match a tasty recipe: Nothing less than chocolate is accepted.

When you make chocolate, you advance, you can upgrade your kitchen, but the demand grows every time, can you keep up?

For the controls, the game only uses a mouse or a touchscreen.


Made by the very same team behind Role of Hex:

Game by Verde, which can be found here.
Music, sounds and art by @studart.h, which can be found here and on his Instagram.
